data.title: JCM Leadership Awards – Home – JMTcom: Maxwell Leadership Certified Team
data.text:
We are excited to announce this year’s winner for the John C. Maxwell Transformational Leadership Awards. Please join us in congratulating Dr. Daniel Amen! Dr. Amen has been a high impact leader impacting the lives of hundreds of thousands.

Share on Facebook

Share on Twitter

Share on LinkedIn

Do You Know a Transformational Leader?

If you know a leader we should interview and consider for our weekly Transformational Leader Podcast, then let us know today. The top candidates featured on the podcast are eligible for nomination into each year’s annual leader award.

2019 Leadership Awards

Each year the John Maxwell Team looks to discover standout leaders making an impact in the lives of others on a transformational scale. This year John Maxwell and his team once again identified an amazing group of leaders who are making a difference.

According to John, “A Transformational Leader is someone who influence people to think, to speak and to act in such a way that it makes a positive impact in their lives AND the lives of others.”

Here are a few pictures from our live event held on Aug 24th. We hope to post a few more soon!

Paul Gustavson and Mark Cole sharing what it takes to be a transformational leader.

Dr. Daniel Amen and Mark Cole, talking about mission.

Dr. Daniel Amen sharing about his passion to help people develop brain envy!

Ms. Barb Stegemann sharing about the importance of mission with Mark Cole

Quint Studer and Mark Cole sharing their thoughts on transformational leadership.

Rhona Bennett doing a little impromptu, serenading John Maxwell with the vocal track to his walk up music.

John Maxwell enjoying the connection with our Final 4 candidates.

Last year’s winner, Mr. Casey Crawford, sharing the stage with John Maxwell.

Last year’s winner with this year’s Final Four in the background!

Casey Crawford preparing to crown this year’s winner.

Dr. Daniel Amen receiving the award from Casey Crawford.

John Maxwell congratulating Dr. Daniel Amen.

John Maxwell expressing his appreciation for Dr. Daniel Amen

John Maxwell valuing Dr. Daniel Amen (black and white)

Dr. Daniel Amen preparing to share his remarks.

Dr. Daniel Amen reflecting on his joy for receiving the award.

Dr. Daniel Amen and John Maxwell doing a Minute with Maxwell.

Dr. Daniel Amen with his wife Tana Amen and John Maxwell

Our Final Four Candidates with John Maxwell, Mark Cole, Team members nominating our Final Four, and our Leadership Awards Committee

2019 Winner

Do You Know a Transformational Leader?

We love leaders – especially leaders making a transformational impact. We’re interested in interviewing them for our Transformational Leader Podcast, and also as potential candidates for our yearly John C. Maxwell Transformational Leadership Award. Let us know who you think is making a difference today.

Take a look back also at our 2018 Awards.

Mr. Casey Crawford Selected as the 2018 Top

Transformational Leader

Each year the John Maxwell Team looks to discover standout leaders making an impact in the lives of others on a transformational scale. This year John Maxwell and his team identified an amazing group of leaders who are making a difference.

The John C. Maxwell Transformational Leadership Awards is about TRANSFORMATIONAL leaders who are making a difference, doing something that makes a difference, with people who make a difference, at a time when it makes a difference. Selected as this year’s recipient of the TRANSFORMATIOnAL LEADERSHIP Award is Mr. Casey Crawford.

Casey has been a high impact leader touching the lives of thousands. He is the co-founder and CEO of Movement Mortgage, the nation’s fastest-growing mortgage lender, and the creator of Movement Foundation. His mission has been to love and value people by leading a movement of change in the financial industry, in corporate cultures, and in communities across America. The result of his work has helped transform how people think of financial services and is inspiring others in the impact they can make.

Casey receiving the 2018 John Maxwell Transformational Leadership Award from last year’s winner Ms. Bonnie St. John

We encourage you to take a moment to celebrate all of our Top 10 Candidates by exploring these three amazing videos highlighting their impact.

Video highlighting our annual celebration of transformational leaders!

Video highlighting our top ten candidates for 2018!

Video highlighting our top candidate. Congratulations Casey Crawford!
